comment:
units of meat and rice:These are the quantities of meat and rice required to make each wrap and platter, respectively.
production time:This refers to the time taken to make each wrap and platter, which is 10 minutes for a wrap and 8 minutes for a platter.
minimize total production time:This means finding the optimal combination of wraps and platters to minimize the overall time taken to produce them, considering the constraints given.
